name: Halloumi Spinach and Tomato dish
instructions: Chop the Fennel and slice the courgette, place on oven tray and drizzle olive oil over the dish add a pinch of Himalayan salt. Place them in oven for 15 min. Meanwhile slice halloumi and prepare the quinoa.
instructions-extended: Add the halloumi and cherry tomatoes to the dish and place in the oven for 15 more minutes. Blanche the spinach and serve the dish.
